about.title: About Us
about.story_1: Hello friends! We are an ordinary family from Kharkiv with a passion for cats. But with the start of the war, our world changed. We couldn't remain indifferent to the disasters they are experiencing.
about.story_2: Today, hundreds of homeless animals are on the streets of our city looking for love and care. We couldn't stay indifferent and started to act. We feed street cats, rescue them from terrible situations, provide medical care, and give them a HOME.
about.story_3: We founded the charity fund "BlueCross for Cats" and opened a home for cats - Meowroom, where they find shelter, warmth, and a loving family. We care for over 60 tails! This is a real home where they feel good. They are loved and cared for, have water, tasty healthy food, and toys for entertainment.
about.story_4: We really hope and count on the help of all caring people! Only together can we help our four-legged friends. And they will demonstrate their gratitude with purring. We really need your help and support.
about.quote: "We become responsible, forever, for what we have tamed."
about.josera_desc: For 4 years now, Josera has been helping our shelter. Every month they provide 100 kg of high-quality holistic food for our cats.

about_section.title: What is Meowroom?
about_section.text_1: "Meowroom" is a unique space in Kharkiv combining the format of an <0>anticafe</0> and a shelter. It's not a regular cafe: we have no kitchen or menu. You only pay for the time spent, enjoying the company of cats.
about_section.text_2: Meowroom has become a real home for rescued cats. Here they live in safety and love. You can come to us to chat with furry friends, and if you wish — take one of them under your care.

rules.title: Visit Rules
rules.intro: Meowroom is not a petting zoo. It is a home for cats and cats set their own rules. Remember that when you come to them, you are visiting them.

list.1: Entry for children under 12 is prohibited, from 12 to 14 years old - only with parents.
list.2: You must enter the premises without street shoes (you can wear rubber slippers or shoe covers, or bring your own indoor shoes).
list.3: Be sure to wash your hands before interacting with the animals.
list.4: Smoking and drinking alcohol is not allowed.
list.5: Watch your children so they do not offend the animals.
list.6: You cannot bring, eat, or give your own food to the cats.
list.7: You cannot pick up cats (unless the cat comes to you itself), and you cannot hold them against their will.
list.8: Do not wake the cat, do not pull the tail, do not disturb while eating.
list.9: Do not shout in the room (cats are afraid of loud sounds).
list.10: Photography is allowed, but without flash.
list.11: You cannot bring other animals with you.
list.12: We ask you not to smoke before visiting the cat cafe (cats are very sensitive to smells).
list.13: Please wear comfortable, inexpensive clothing (cats may jump, make a snag, leave fur on your clothes).

rules.outro: Cats are the owners, and you are their guests! Please remember this.
rules.disclaimer: The administration of the cat club reserves the right to ask you to leave the premises if our rules are not followed.

vision.title: Our Dream and Goal
vision.text: "Meowroom" aims to become not just a shelter, but a large-scale social project. We want to create a space where care for animals intertwines with support for people and public education.

integration.title: Social Integration
integration.desc: Creating jobs for people with disabilities, providing them with decent work and socialization within our project.
